sentences.en: A programmed or designed hardware implementation of priority interrupt functions.
sentences.cn: 一种程控的或设计的硬件优先级中断功能的实现.

sentences.en: EPA's approach to settlement changed radically during the early implementation of Superfund.
sentences.cn: 在实施"特级储备"的初级阶段,环境保护署对和解的态度发生了根本的改变.

sentences.en: For this reason, many programmers present hierarchies ( the implementation model ) in user interfaces.
sentences.cn: 基于这个原因, 很多程序员喜欢在界面中展现层次关系 ( 实现模型 ).

sentences.en: I have given you the idea; its technical implementation is up to you.
sentences.cn: 我已经给你们出了主意, 至于技术上的事儿该看你们的了.

sentences.en: If I now scroll down to the actual implementation, now does this work or not work?
sentences.cn: 如果现在我向下滚动到实际的执行中，这个是可用的还是不可用的呢？

sentences.en: Implementation of the program is now well underway.
sentences.cn: 这一项目的实施现在行情看好.

sentences.en: Interaction designers must shield users from implementation models.
sentences.cn: 交互设计者必须要将实现模型隐藏起来,不能让用户看到.

sentences.en: It allows us to separate the specification of the object (how you interact with it) from the implementation.
sentences.cn: 它允许我们从实现中剥离对象的规范（如何与它交互）。

sentences.en: Mathematical thinking is an implementation model trap that is particularly easy for programmers to fall into.
sentences.cn: 数学式的思维方式是实现模型的陷阱,尤其是程序员特别容易掉进去.

sentences.en: Notation for PL changes from one implementation to the next.
sentences.cn: PL的表示方法将随实现方法的不同而有所改变.

sentences.en: One file describes the interface to your service, while the other file describes your implementation of it.
sentences.cn: 一个文件描述到您的服务的接口，而另一个文件描述这个接口的实现。

sentences.en: Similarly, programmers apply self - referential design when they create implementation - model products.
sentences.cn: 同样, 当程序员创建基于实现模型的产品时,应用的是自参考设计.

sentences.en: The advantage of this implementation is speed.
sentences.cn: 这种计数器的优点是速度快.

sentences.en: The details of the implementation depend on how we represent time.
sentences.cn: 这些实现的细节依赖于我们如何去表示时间。

sentences.en: The implementation of digital equipments would have been otherwise impractical due to size and cost.
sentences.cn: 受体积和成本的限制,制造这些数字设备是不现实的.

sentences.en: There are several different implementation of this method.
sentences.cn: 对该方法还有一些补充.

sentences.en: These considerations are valid for any implementation or organization.
sentences.cn: 这些考虑对任何一种方法或结构都是有效的.

sentences.en: They do, however, greatly affect the implementation of those patterns.
sentences.cn: 然而，它们的确对那些模式的 实现影响很大。

sentences.en: They do, however, greatly affect the implementation of those patterns.
sentences.cn: 然而，它们的确对那些模式的 实现影响很大。

sentences.en: They may vary from implementation to implementation.
sentences.cn: 在不同的工序中它们是各不相同的.

sentences.en: User interfaces should be based on user mental models rather than implementation models.
sentences.cn: 用户界面应该基于用户的心理模型,而不能基于实现模型.
